meanings.sent1: The forest was multitudinous with colorful birds.
meanings.sent2: The multitudinous stars filled the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The multitudinous amount of balloons at the party made it a festive sight.
meanings.sent4: Her multitudinous collection of books overflowed from the shelves.
meanings.sent5: The multitudinous waves crashing against the shore created a mesmerizing rhythm.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or containing a multitude.
meanings.sent1: The multitudinous flavors in the dish delighted our taste buds.
meanings.sent2: The multitudinous colors of the painting brought it to life.
meanings.sent3: The multitudinous ingredients in the recipe made it a culinary adventure.
meanings.sent4: His multitudinous talents ranged from painting to playing music.
meanings.sent5: The multitudinous voices in the choir blended harmoniously during the performance.
